availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Gustavus V. Erickson (Clark County, Indiana, farmer)

body.p: Clark County, Indiana, farmer. New York native. Married to Mary Erickson. Farmer in Clark County, Indiana, in 1850. Farmer in Clark County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Clark County, Monroe Township, p. 76A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Indiana, Clark County, Union Township, p. 94.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Indiana, Clark County, Union Township, p. 581A.
